instructions.name: accept_admin
docs: Accept a pending admin transfer (must be called by the nominated key).

instructions.name: add_trusted_provider
docs: Register a trusted artwork provider program (protocol admin only).

instructions.name: authorize_key
docs: Authorize a new key NFT for a position (admin only).

accounts.name: admin_key_asset
docs: The admin's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position to authorize a key for. Mutable to update last_admin_activity.

accounts.name: new_key_asset
docs: The MPL-Core asset for the new key NFT. Created by MPL-Core CPI.

accounts.name: target_wallet
docs: The wallet that will receive the new key NFT.

accounts.name: key_state
docs: KeyState PDA for the new key (tracks mutable state like rate-limit buckets).

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — needed to read the collection address.

accounts.name: collection
docs: The MPL-Core collection asset for Härdig key NFTs.

instructions.name: borrow
docs: Borrow SOL against the navSOL floor (borrow or limited-borrow key).

accounts.name: key_asset
docs: The signer's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: key_state
docs: Optional KeyState for rate-limited keys (validated in handler).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position to borrow against.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — provides collection pubkey for key validation.

accounts.name: market_config
docs: The MarketConfig for this position's market.

accounts.name: program_pda
docs: Mutable because Mayflower CPI marks user_wallet as writable.

accounts.name: user_base_token_ata
docs: Program PDA's wSOL ATA (receives borrowed funds).

instructions.name: buy
docs: Buy navSOL by depositing SOL (admin, operator, or depositor).
`min_out`: minimum navSOL shares to receive (slippage protection, 0 = no check).

accounts.name: key_asset
docs: The signer's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position to buy navSOL for.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — provides collection pubkey for key validation.

accounts.name: market_config
docs: The MarketConfig for this position's market.

accounts.name: program_pda
docs: Program PDA (authority) that owns the Mayflower PersonalPosition.
Mutable because Mayflower CPI marks user_wallet as writable.

accounts.name: personal_position
docs: Mayflower PersonalPosition PDA.

accounts.name: user_shares
docs: Mayflower user shares escrow.

accounts.name: user_nav_sol_ata
docs: Program PDA's navSOL ATA.

accounts.name: user_wsol_ata
docs: Program PDA's wSOL ATA.

accounts.name: tenant
docs: Mayflower tenant.

accounts.name: market_group
docs: Mayflower market group.

accounts.name: market_meta
docs: Mayflower market metadata.

accounts.name: mayflower_market
docs: Mayflower market.

accounts.name: nav_sol_mint
docs: navSOL mint.

accounts.name: market_base_vault
docs: Mayflower market base vault.

accounts.name: market_nav_vault
docs: Mayflower market nav vault.

accounts.name: fee_vault
docs: Mayflower fee vault.

accounts.name: wsol_mint
docs: wSOL mint (baseMint for Mayflower CPI).

accounts.name: mayflower_program
docs: Mayflower program.

accounts.name: log_account
docs: Mayflower log account.

instructions.name: claim_promo_key
docs: Claim a promo key NFT from a PromoConfig (permissionless — anyone can call).
`amount`: lamports to deposit via Mayflower buy CPI (must be >= promo.min_deposit_lamports).
`min_out`: minimum navSOL shares to receive (slippage protection, 0 = no check).

accounts.name: claimer
docs: The user claiming the promo key. Pays rent for ClaimReceipt + KeyState + NFT.

accounts.name: promo
docs: The PromoConfig PDA — read params, increment claims_count.

accounts.name: claim_receipt
docs: One-per-wallet guard. Init fails if PDA already exists.

accounts.name: position
docs: The position this promo is for. Mutable because deposited_nav updates.

accounts.name: key_asset
docs: The new MPL-Core asset for the key NFT.

accounts.name: key_state
docs: KeyState PDA for rate limiting.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — collection address + CPI signer.

accounts.name: collection
docs: The MPL-Core collection asset.

accounts.name: market_config
docs: The MarketConfig for this position's market.

accounts.name: program_pda
docs: Program PDA (authority) that owns the Mayflower PersonalPosition.

accounts.name: personal_position
docs: Mayflower PersonalPosition PDA.

accounts.name: user_shares
docs: Mayflower user shares escrow.

accounts.name: user_nav_sol_ata
docs: Program PDA's navSOL ATA.

accounts.name: user_wsol_ata
docs: Program PDA's wSOL ATA.

accounts.name: tenant
docs: Mayflower tenant.

accounts.name: market_group
docs: Mayflower market group.

accounts.name: market_meta
docs: Mayflower market metadata.

accounts.name: mayflower_market
docs: Mayflower market.

accounts.name: nav_sol_mint
docs: navSOL mint.

accounts.name: market_base_vault
docs: Mayflower market base vault.

accounts.name: market_nav_vault
docs: Mayflower market nav vault.

accounts.name: fee_vault
docs: Mayflower fee vault.

accounts.name: wsol_mint
docs: wSOL mint (baseMint for Mayflower CPI).

accounts.name: mayflower_program
docs: Mayflower program.

accounts.name: log_account
docs: Mayflower log account.

instructions.name: configure_recovery
docs: Configure a recovery key for dead-man's switch protection (admin only).

accounts.name: admin_key_asset
docs: The admin's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position to configure recovery for.

accounts.name: recovery_asset
docs: The new MPL-Core asset for the recovery key. Created by MPL-Core CPI.

accounts.name: target_wallet
docs: The wallet that will hold the recovery key (should differ from admin).

accounts.name: old_recovery_asset
docs: Existing recovery key asset to burn (if replacing). Optional.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — needed to read the collection address and sign.

accounts.name: collection
docs: The MPL-Core collection asset for Härdig key NFTs.

instructions.name: create_collection
docs: Create the MPL-Core collection for all Härdig key NFTs (protocol admin only, once).

accounts.name: collection_asset
docs: The MPL-Core collection asset. Fresh keypair, signed by the caller.

instructions.name: create_market_config
docs: Create a MarketConfig PDA for a Mayflower market (protocol admin only).

accounts.name: config
docs: The global protocol config — used to verify the signer is the protocol admin.

instructions.name: create_position
docs: Create a new position with an admin key NFT.

accounts.name: admin_asset
docs: The MPL-Core asset for the admin key NFT. Created by MPL-Core CPI.

accounts.name: position
docs: The position account.

accounts.name: program_pda
docs: Per-position authority PDA. Used for Mayflower CPI signing;
bump stored in PositionState.authority_bump.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — needed to read the collection address and sign as
collection authority when adding the asset to the collection.

accounts.name: collection
docs: The MPL-Core collection asset for Härdig key NFTs.

accounts.name: market_config
docs: The MarketConfig for the target market.

accounts.name: mayflower_personal_position
docs: The Mayflower PersonalPosition PDA.

accounts.name: mayflower_user_shares
docs: The Mayflower PersonalPosition escrow (user shares).

accounts.name: mayflower_market_meta
docs: The Mayflower market metadata.

accounts.name: nav_sol_mint
docs: The navSOL mint.

accounts.name: mayflower_log
docs: The Mayflower log account.

accounts.name: mayflower_program
docs: The Mayflower program.

instructions.name: create_promo
docs: Create a PromoConfig PDA for a position (admin only).

accounts.name: admin_key_asset
docs: The admin's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position this promo is for.

accounts.name: promo
docs: The PromoConfig PDA to create. Seeds include name_suffix to allow multiple promos per position.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — provides collection pubkey for key validation.

instructions.name: execute_recovery
docs: Execute recovery after lockout period has expired (recovery key holder only).

accounts.name: recovery_key_asset
docs: The recovery key NFT (MPL-Core asset). Mutable because it gets burned.

accounts.name: position
docs: The position to recover.

accounts.name: old_admin_asset
docs: The old admin's MPL-Core asset (to burn).

accounts.name: new_admin_asset
docs: The new MPL-Core asset for the new admin key. Created by MPL-Core CPI.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — needed to sign as collection authority.

accounts.name: collection
docs: The MPL-Core collection asset for Härdig key NFTs.

instructions.name: heartbeat
docs: No-op liveness proof. Updates last_admin_activity to prove admin is active.

accounts.name: admin_key_asset
docs: The admin's key NFT (MPL-Core asset). Must be the current admin key.

accounts.name: position
docs: The position to update activity for.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — provides collection pubkey for key validation.

instructions.name: initialize_protocol
docs: Initialize the global protocol config. Called once by the deployer.

instructions.name: migrate_config
docs: Migrate ProtocolConfig from v0 (41 bytes) to v1 (73 bytes, adds collection field).

accounts.name: config
docs: The config PDA. We use UncheckedAccount because the old layout
can't be deserialized as the new ProtocolConfig struct.

instructions.name: reinvest
docs: Reinvest new borrow capacity into more navSOL (admin, operator, or keeper).
`min_out`: minimum navSOL shares to receive from the buy (slippage protection, 0 = no check).
`max_spread_bps`: maximum market/floor spread in basis points (0 = no check).

accounts.name: key_asset
docs: The signer's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position to reinvest for.

accounts.name: market_config
docs: The MarketConfig for this position's market.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — provides collection pubkey for key validation.

accounts.name: program_pda
docs: Mutable because Mayflower CPI marks user_wallet as writable.

accounts.name: user_wsol_ata
docs: Program PDA's wSOL ATA (used for buy CPI input).

accounts.name: user_base_token_ata
docs: Program PDA's wSOL ATA (used for borrow CPI output).
In practice this is the same address as user_wsol_ata.

instructions.name: remove_trusted_provider
docs: Deactivate a trusted artwork provider program (protocol admin only).

instructions.name: repay
docs: Repay borrowed SOL (admin, operator, or depositor).

accounts.name: key_asset
docs: The signer's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position to repay debt for.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — provides collection pubkey for key validation.

accounts.name: market_config
docs: The MarketConfig for this position's market.

accounts.name: program_pda
docs: Mutable because Mayflower CPI marks user_wallet as writable.

accounts.name: user_base_token_ata
docs: Program PDA's wSOL ATA (repays from this account).

accounts.name: log_account
docs: Mayflower log account.

instructions.name: revoke_key
docs: Revoke a key by burning its MPL-Core asset (admin only).

accounts.name: admin_key_asset
docs: The admin's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position. Mutable to update last_admin_activity.

accounts.name: target_asset
docs: The target key asset to revoke and burn.

accounts.name: target_key_state
docs: The target key's KeyState PDA. Closed, rent refunded to admin.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — signs burn as the collection's update authority
(PermanentBurnDelegate authority).

accounts.name: collection
docs: The MPL-Core collection asset for Härdig key NFTs.

instructions.name: set_position_artwork
docs: Set or clear custom artwork on a position (admin key required).
When setting, pass receipt + TrustedProvider PDA as remaining_accounts.

accounts.name: admin_key_asset
docs: The admin's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position to update artwork for. Mutable to update artwork_id + last_admin_activity.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — needed to read the collection address for validate_key.

instructions.name: transfer_admin
docs: Nominate a new protocol admin (current admin only). The nominated key
must call `accept_admin` to complete the transfer.

accounts.name: admin_key_asset
docs: The admin's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position this promo belongs to.

accounts.name: promo
docs: The PromoConfig PDA to update.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — provides collection pubkey for key validation.

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw SOL/navSOL from the position (sell or limited-sell key).
`min_out`: minimum wSOL to receive (slippage protection, 0 = no check).

accounts.name: key_asset
docs: The signer's key NFT (MPL-Core asset).

accounts.name: key_state
docs: Optional KeyState for rate-limited keys (validated in handler).

accounts.name: position
docs: The position to withdraw from.

accounts.name: config
docs: Protocol config PDA — provides collection pubkey for key validation.

accounts.name: market_config
docs: The MarketConfig for this position's market.

accounts.name: program_pda
docs: Mutable because Mayflower CPI marks user_wallet as writable.

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Signer is not authorized for this action

errors.name: AdminOnly
errors.msg: This action requires admin key

errors.name: InsufficientPermission
errors.msg: Key does not have the required permission for this instruction

errors.name: KeyNotHeld
errors.msg: Signer does not hold the key NFT

errors.name: InvalidKey
errors.msg: Key asset has invalid or missing attributes

errors.name: WrongPosition
errors.msg: Key asset does not belong to this position

errors.name: CannotCreateSecondAdmin
errors.msg: Cannot grant PERM_MANAGE_KEYS to delegated keys

errors.name: CannotRevokeAdminKey
errors.msg: Cannot revoke the admin key

errors.name: KeyAlreadyAuthorized
errors.msg: Key is already authorized for this position

errors.name: InvalidKeyRole
errors.msg: Invalid permissions value (zero or reserved bits set)

errors.name: InsufficientFunds
errors.msg: Insufficient funds for this operation

errors.name: BorrowCapacityExceeded
errors.msg: Borrow amount exceeds available capacity

errors.name: ReinvestSpreadTooHigh
errors.msg: Market/floor spread exceeds max_spread_bps

errors.name: InvalidMayflowerAccount
errors.msg: Invalid Nirvana account address or derivation

errors.name: SlippageExceeded
errors.msg: Output amount is less than minimum specified (slippage exceeded)

errors.name: InvalidAta
errors.msg: Token account is not the correct ATA for the program PDA

errors.name: RateLimitExceeded
errors.msg: Rate limit exceeded

errors.name: TotalLimitExceeded
errors.msg: Total lifetime limit exceeded

errors.name: CollectionNotCreated
errors.msg: Collection has not been created yet

errors.name: CollectionAlreadyCreated
errors.msg: Collection has already been created

errors.name: AlreadyMigrated
errors.msg: Config account already has the expected size

errors.name: InvalidNftMint
errors.msg: Invalid NFT mint

errors.name: InvalidPositionPda
errors.msg: Invalid position PDA

errors.name: PositionAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Position already exists for this admin key

errors.name: NameTooLong
errors.msg: Custom name suffix exceeds 32 characters

errors.name: ImageUriTooLong
errors.msg: Image URI exceeds maximum allowed length

errors.name: RecoveryNotConfigured
errors.msg: No recovery key is configured for this position

errors.name: RecoveryLockoutNotExpired
errors.msg: Admin has been active within the lockout period

errors.name: RecoveryConfigLocked
errors.msg: Recovery configuration is locked and cannot be changed

errors.name: InvalidLockout
errors.msg: Lockout period must be greater than zero

errors.name: OldRecoveryAssetRequired
errors.msg: Must provide old_recovery_asset to replace an existing recovery key

errors.name: MaxClaimsBelowCurrent
errors.msg: Max claims cannot be less than current claims count

errors.name: PromoInactive
errors.msg: Promo is not active

errors.name: PromoMaxClaimsReached
errors.msg: Promo has reached maximum claims

errors.name: InvalidInitialFill
errors.msg: Initial fill must be 0-10000 basis points

errors.name: InvalidArtworkReceipt
errors.msg: Invalid artwork receipt account (bad discriminator, length, or data)

errors.name: UntrustedProvider
errors.msg: Artwork receipt is not owned by a trusted provider program

errors.name: ArtworkReceiptPositionMismatch
errors.msg: Artwork receipt position_seed does not match this position

types.name: ClaimReceipt
docs: One-time claim receipt preventing double-claims.
PDA seeds = [b"claim", promo_pda, claimer_pubkey].

fields.name: claimer
docs: The wallet that claimed.

fields.name: promo
docs: The PromoConfig PDA this receipt belongs to.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for this PDA.

types.name: KeyState
docs: Mutable state for a key NFT. Created for all delegated keys (via authorize_key).
PDA seeds = [b"key_state", asset].

fields.name: authority_seed
docs: The position's authority_seed this key belongs to.
First field after discriminator (offset 8) for memcmp filtering.

fields.name: asset
docs: The MPL-Core asset this state belongs to.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for this PDA.

fields.name: sell_bucket
docs: Rate-limit bucket for PERM_LIMITED_SELL.

fields.name: borrow_bucket
docs: Rate-limit bucket for PERM_LIMITED_BORROW.

fields.name: total_sell_limit
docs: Optional lifetime sell cap (0 = no cap). Units: navSOL shares.

fields.name: total_sold
docs: Accumulator of total navSOL shares sold via this key.

fields.name: total_borrow_limit
docs: Optional lifetime borrow cap (0 = no cap). Units: lamports.

fields.name: total_borrowed
docs: Accumulator of total lamports borrowed via this key.

types.name: MarketConfig
docs: On-chain configuration for a Mayflower market.
PDA seeds = [b"market_config", nav_mint].

fields.name: nav_mint
docs: The nav token mint (e.g. navSOL) — also the PDA seed.

fields.name: base_mint
docs: The base mint (e.g. wSOL) — included for markets with non-SOL base.

fields.name: market_group
docs: Mayflower market group account.

fields.name: market_meta
docs: Mayflower market metadata account.

fields.name: mayflower_market
docs: Mayflower market account.

fields.name: market_base_vault
docs: Mayflower market base vault.

fields.name: market_nav_vault
docs: Mayflower market nav vault.

fields.name: fee_vault
docs: Mayflower fee vault.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for the MarketConfig PDA.

types.name: PositionState
docs: A navSOL position controlled by an NFT keyring.
PDA seeds = [b"position", authority_seed].

fields.name: authority_seed
docs: Permanent PDA seed (first admin asset pubkey). Never changes after creation.

fields.name: position_pda
docs: The Mayflower PersonalPosition PDA owned by this program.

fields.name: market_config
docs: The MarketConfig PDA this position is bound to (set during create_position).

fields.name: deposited_nav
docs: navSOL deposited (local tracking, Mayflower is source of truth).

fields.name: user_debt
docs: Total SOL borrowed (user + reinvest). Mayflower is source of truth.

fields.name: _reserved_u16
docs: Reserved (was max_reinvest_spread_bps, now a runtime arg on reinvest).

fields.name: last_admin_activity
docs: Last time the admin signed an instruction (unix timestamp).
Used for future time-locked recovery mechanism.

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for the position PDA.

fields.name: authority_bump
docs: Bump seed for the per-position authority PDA (seeds = [b"authority", authority_seed]).

fields.name: current_admin_asset
docs: The current admin key NFT (MPL-Core asset). Updated on recovery.

fields.name: recovery_asset
docs: The recovery key NFT (MPL-Core asset). Pubkey::default() = no recovery configured.

fields.name: recovery_lockout_secs
docs: Inactivity threshold in seconds before recovery can execute.

fields.name: recovery_config_locked
docs: If true, recovery config cannot be changed.

fields.name: artwork_id
docs: Optional artwork set ID for custom key visuals. None = default artwork.

types.name: PromoConfig
docs: Per-position promo configuration.
PDA seeds = [b"promo", authority_seed, name_suffix].

fields.name: authority_seed
docs: Which position this promo is for (the position's authority_seed).

fields.name: permissions
docs: Key permissions bitmask granted to claimed promo keys.

fields.name: borrow_capacity
docs: LimitedBorrow bucket capacity (lamports).

fields.name: borrow_refill_period
docs: LimitedBorrow refill period (slots).

fields.name: sell_capacity
docs: LimitedSell bucket capacity (0 if N/A).

fields.name: sell_refill_period
docs: LimitedSell refill period (0 if N/A).

fields.name: min_deposit_lamports
docs: Suggested deposit amount in lamports (frontend reads).

fields.name: max_claims
docs: Max total keys that can be claimed (0 = unlimited).

fields.name: claims_count
docs: Current number of claimed keys.

fields.name: active
docs: Admin can pause/resume claiming.

fields.name: total_borrow_limit
docs: Optional lifetime borrow cap for claimed keys (0 = no cap). Units: lamports.

fields.name: total_sell_limit
docs: Optional lifetime sell cap for claimed keys (0 = no cap). Units: navSOL shares.

fields.name: initial_fill_bps
docs: Initial bucket fill level in basis points (0 = empty, 10000 = full).

fields.name: name_suffix
docs: NFT name suffix (e.g. "Promo Borrow").

fields.name: image_uri
docs: Custom NFT image URL (max 128 bytes).

fields.name: market_name
docs: Market name for NFT metadata (e.g. "navSOL").

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for this PDA.

types.name: ProtocolConfig
docs: Global protocol configuration. Singleton PDA (seeds = [b"config"]).

fields.name: admin
docs: The admin who initialized the protocol.

fields.name: collection
docs: The MPL-Core collection for all Härdig key NFTs (Pubkey::default() = not yet created).

fields.name: pending_admin
docs: Pending admin for two-step transfer (Pubkey::default() = no pending transfer).

fields.name: bump
docs: Bump seed for the config PDA.

types.name: RateBucket
docs: Token-bucket rate limiter. Embedded in KeyState.

fields.name: capacity
docs: Maximum tokens (shares for sell, lamports for borrow).

fields.name: refill_period
docs: Number of slots for a full refill from 0 to capacity.

fields.name: level
docs: Current tokens available.

fields.name: last_update
docs: Slot of last update.

types.name: TrustedProvider
docs: Marker PDA for a trusted artwork provider program.
PDA seeds = [b"trusted_provider", program_id].

fields.name: program_id
docs: The trusted provider program ID.

fields.name: added_by
docs: Protocol admin who added it.

fields.name: active
docs: Can be deactivated without deleting.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed.
